name: GK888T
description: Desktop thermal printer supporting direct thermal and thermal transfer printing, designed for reliable barcode label and tag printing in retail, logistics, and office environments.

name: Orbit 7120
description: Hands-free omnidirectional barcode scanner built for high-volume retail POS use. Offers fast and accurate 1D barcode scanning with an adjustable scan head to easily handle items of different sizes.

name: CP-Q5
description: Compact 3-inch thermal receipt printer designed for POS environments, offering fast and reliable printing with an automatic cutter and support for common POS connectivity options.

name: USR5639
description: 56K USB soft modem designed for dial-up internet and fax communication, supporting V.92/V.90 standards with plug-and-play installation. Includes Caller ID support for incoming calls when used with compatible phone service and drivers.

name: GS-405A
description: Durable POS cash drawer designed for reliable cash management in retail and hospitality environments, featuring multiple bill and coin compartments, robust locking mechanisms, and compatibility with POS systems via RJ11/RJ12 or USB interfaces

name: VFD-450
description: Vacuum fluorescent POS customer display with a 20×2 character screen, adjustable viewing angle, and serial/USB connectivity for showing transaction details at checkout.

name: DSP-880VF-B
description: VFD POS customer display with a 2×20 character vacuum fluorescent screen and USB/RS232 connectivity, designed to show transaction totals and messages at the point of sale.

name: LaserJet M111a
description: Monochrome laser printer offering fast and reliable black-and-white printing up to ~20–21 pages per minute with USB connectivity, compact design ideal for home or small office use, and a standard input tray supporting up to ~150 sheets.

Optical USB fingerprint reader designed for secure biometric authentication, offering high-quality fingerprint image capture and compatibility with HID DigitalPersona software for desktop and POS environments.

FIPS-certified optical USB fingerprint reader with rugged IP64-rated housing, high-resolution image capture, and integrated status LEDs, designed for secure biometric authentication and identity verification in desktop and enterprise environments.

name: ZK-MSR
description: USB magnetic stripe card reader supporting bidirectional swipe, hardware decoding, and plug-and-play operation for reading ISO standard mag-stripe cards in POS, VIP management, and query systems.

name: S30GD
description: 24-inch Full HD IPS monitor with 100 Hz refresh rate, designed for smooth visuals and everyday productivity.

name: Wood-Free
description: High-quality wood-free paper roll suitable for impact and dot-matrix printers, offering clear printing and improved durability for receipts and reports.

name: Thermal
description: Heat-sensitive thermal paper roll used with thermal receipt printers, delivering fast, ink-free printing for POS and billing applications.

name: 2-Ply
description: Two-ply paper roll designed for impact and dot-matrix receipt printers, providing a duplicate copy for record keeping in retail and hospitality environments.

name: 3-Ply
description: Three-ply paper roll for impact printers, producing multiple copies of receipts for accounting, customer, and merchant use in POS systems.

name: Customized Thermal
description: Customized thermal paper roll with pre-printed BIM POS branding, designed for use with thermal receipt printers. Ideal for enhancing brand visibility on customer receipts while maintaining clear, reliable print quality for daily POS operations.

name: TL-SG2210MP
description: 10-port Gigabit PoE+ smart network switch with 8 PoE+ RJ45 ports and 2 SFP uplink slots, offering centralized Omada SDN cloud management, advanced Layer 2 features (VLAN, QoS, IGMP snooping), and robust security for small to medium business wired networks.

name: W1106A
description: Compatible black toner cartridge designed as a reliable replacement for HP 106A (W1106A), delivering crisp text and sharp monochrome prints. Offers an approximate yield of 1,000 pages at 5% coverage and is suitable for HP Laser 107, 135, and 137 series printers, ideal for home and small office printing.

name: W1500A
description: Compatible black toner cartridge designed for HP laser printers, delivering sharp text and clear graphics with consistent, reliable performance. Offers excellent value with dependable page yield, easy installation, and environmentally friendly recycling support, making it suitable for both home and small office printing needs.

name: MS822B
description: Wireless barcode scanner supporting 1D and 2D codes with Bluetooth, 2.4 GHz wireless, and USB connectivity. Designed for reliable scanning with long battery life and a durable build for retail and inventory applications.

name: GS-I1S
description: 15.1-inch all-in-one touch POS terminal with Intel Core i7 processor, 8 GB DDR3 RAM, 128 GB SSD storage, and dual screens, designed for reliable performance in retail, restaurant, and hospitality checkout environments.

name: GS-T2
description: 15-inch desktop POS terminal with Intel i5 processor, 8 GB RAM, 128 GB SSD, and 1024×768 resolution touchscreen, designed for bar, retail, and hospitality environments with customizable configuration options.

name: EA520
description: Rugged 5″ handheld mobile computer with integrated 1D/2D barcode scanner, Android OS with GMS certification, octa-core processor, 4 GB RAM/64 GB storage, long-lasting removable battery, and robust connectivity including Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, and 4G LTE. Designed for versatile use in retail, logistics, field service, and inventory management with IP67 dust/water protection and durable drop resistance.

name: TL-SG1016D
description: Unmanaged 16-port Gigabit Ethernet switch providing reliable plug-and-play connectivity with energy-efficient design, ideal for expanding wired networks in small offices and business environments.

name: A400 480GB SSD
description: SATA III 2.5″ internal solid-state drive with 480 GB capacity, offering high reliability, fast read/write performance, and low power consumption. Designed for accelerating system boot, application load times, and overall responsiveness in desktops and laptops.

name: XP-T80Q
description: Thermal receipt printer with LAN and USB interfaces, designed for reliable printing of receipts in retail, hospitality, and POS environments.

name: TL-SG1008D
description: Unmanaged 8-port Gigabit Ethernet network switch with plug-and-play operation, desktop or wall-mountable design, fanless plastic casing, and traffic optimization for reliable wired connectivity in home and small business networks.

name: GS-I1S Single
description: 15.1-inch all-in-one touch POS terminal with Intel Core i7 processor, 8 GB DDR3 RAM, and 128 GB SSD storage, featuring a single touchscreen display. Designed for reliable performance in retail, restaurant, and hospitality checkout environments.
